tit.e: Senyokoutaku (an thin engraved print as a cicada wing)
tit.cmt: 単語の訳を追加しました
tit.e: Senyokoutaku (an thin engraved print as a cicada wing)

sen.j: 蝉翼拓（せんよくたく）はセミの羽根のように薄くとられた拓本、もしくは拓本をとる技法。
sen.e: Senyokutaku refers to a light-colored engraved print like a cicada wing, or a technique of such rubbing.
Senyokutaku refers to a light-colored engraved print like a cicada wing, or a technique of such rubbing.
Senyokutaku refers to a light-colored engraved print like a cicada wing, or a technique of such rubbing.

sen.j: もともと中国では拓本の成り立ちからいって、拓本は濃く採られる傾向があった。
sen.e: An engraved print originally tended to be rubbed darkly in China due to the origin of engraved prints.
An engraved print originally tended to be rubbed darkly in China due to the origin of engraved prints.
An engraved print originally tended to be rubbed darkly in China due to the origin of engraved prints.

sen.j: それに対して蝉翼拓は、拓本そのものに美しさを見いだした、当時としては異色な拓本である。
sen.e: On the contrary, Senyokutaku was a unique engraved print at the time, which people discovered beauty in the engraved print itself.
On the contrary, Senyokutaku was a unique engraved print at the time, which people discovered beauty in the engraved print itself.
On the contrary, Senyokutaku was a unique engraved print at the time, which people discovered beauty in the engraved print itself.

sen.j: 中国宋代に作られたといわれる。
sen.e: It is said to have made in the Song dynasty in China.
It is said to have been made in the Song dynasty in China.
It is said to have been made in the Song dynasty in China.

sen.j: 実際に本当に薄くとるのは難しい技法である。
sen.e: It is a difficult technique to rub really lightly as a practical matter.
It is a difficult technique to rub really lightly as a practical matter.
It is a difficult technique to rub really lightly as a practical matter.
